QuestData.Title: Azure Span
QuestData.Description:
The Kirin Tor need all the help they can get tracking down the Blue Dragon Oathstone.
Some of their mages have been spotted in the Ohn'ahran Plains looking for help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Masud the Wise within the Ohn'ahran Plains.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, another adventurer! We could use your aid.
